pages.title: Kamen Rider Core
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ã— Kamen Rider OOO & W Featuring Skull: Movie War Core (2010, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ooo/devices/gaia_core_typhoon#core_driver)Gaia Core Typhoon$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Night Vision$(li)Fire Resistance III$(li)Strength$(br2)Right-click the $(l:w/items/dopant_memories#memory_memory)Memory Memory$(/l) to turn giant (Giant III)
